1.content:
I know, boring choice chapters. Don't use too many of these, and at least one paragraph per page!

Just chose your prefrence of athletes.
1.title: The intro

choices: You run away and jump into one of Russ’s shoes
He sees you and picks you up
112.content:
You had grown up as an Oklahoma City Thunder Fan, and you loved Russell Westbrook. You’d didn’t just love him as a basketball player either. He mesmerized you on the court with his powerful and sexy body, and his feet were gigantic and incredibly sexy. You would spend hours every day watching videos and looking at photos of him. You basically worshipped him as a god, and you fantasized meeting him.

One evening, you had fallen asleep dreaming about Russell when suddenly you woke up in an NBA locker room, shrunk to only 3 inches tall. You look up and see Russ’s enormous, godlike body as he sits down on the bench in front of you. He’s not wearing anything but his underwear, and you’re awestruck by the sight of him. Though getting shrunk surprised you, you know that this is an opportunity of a lifetime.

All of a sudden, you see Russ’s enormous size 15 foot begin to be lowered on top of you. You have always been amazed by how big his feet are for his size, as his feet dwarfed the size of most NBA point guards, but at the moment you were scared for your life. Giant droplets of his sweat began to fall upon you. Then...
112.title: Giant Russell Westbrook

choices: You are squashed in between Russ’s huge toes
You suddenly grow back to normal size
1123.title: Something else happens

choices: You try to get LeBrons  help, fall in between  his toes
LeBron sees you by his feet
113.content:
You had won tickets to go the Cleveland Cavaliers locker room after their home game against the Miami heat, and meet LeBron James, your favorite player.

You take your pass and enter the locker room, when something strange happens. You shrink down too the size of 1 inch, as a massive LeBron enters the room. LeBron is barefooted, with only his boxers on. His giant foot gets awfully close to you, still sweaty from the game. What happens next?
113.title: LeBron James

A story about being shrunken by male atheltes, and used as a plaything by them! Any male athelte can be used, present or past
